name: product_service_minimal
description: Clean Q&A template with centered profile picture and question/answer layout

samples.text: Streamlined service for efficient task management

fieldPrompt.text: Write a compelling product or service description (8-10 words) that highlights key benefits or features. Focus on what makes your offering unique and valuable. Examples: Premium quality, sustainable materials, handcrafted excellence, Fast, reliable, professional service you can trust.
fieldPrompt.website_url: Enter your business website URL (e.g., yourbusiness.com, shop.yourbrand.com). Omit http:// or www for a cleaner, more professional appearance.
fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a clean, minimal product image that showcases your offering. Include specific details about the subject, lighting, background, and composition. Focus on simplicity, clarity, and professional presentation that aligns with a minimal aesthetic.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Enter a hex color code that represents your brand identity (e.g., #FF5733 for orange, #4A90E2 for blue). Choose a color that aligns with your brand and creates the right emotional response for your target audience.
